name: com.caskev.grid-toolkit
description: Utilitary API to proceed operations on abstract grids such as tile extraction, raycasting, and pathfinding.

samples.description: Contains required assets and scripts in order to use any other sample from this package. Import it prior to any other sample.
Install the 'Shared Assets' sample prior to this one. Explore the API through an interactive UI.
Install the 'Shared Assets' sample prior to this one. Minimalistic demo of weighted tiles usage.
Install the 'Shared Assets' sample prior to this one. Minimalistic demo of a tower defense game using DijkstraGrid.
Install the 'Shared Assets' sample prior to this one. Minimalistic demo of a tactical strategy game using DijkstraField.
